# openfaas_secret (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "openfaas_secret" "new_secret" {
  name      = "test-function"
  namespace = "openfaas-fn"
  value     = "example secret value!"
}
```

### Required

- **name** (String)
- **value** (String, Sensitive)

### Optional

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
- **namespace** (String)
